overview: A Kentucky horse owner hires an ex-jockey, who is now working as a waiter, to train his thoroughbred race horse for an upcoming race. However, a gambling ring that doesn't want the horse entering the race has other plans.
tagline: A RACE FOR GOLD AND A GIRL. ROMANCE, ROBUST ACTION AGAINST THE COLORFUL BACKGROUND OF THAT GRAND OLD AMERICAN INSTITUTION!
title: The County Fair
